CustomField.description: Defines if Allowances can be added via Timesheet Manager. When TRUE, Users can create Allowances and apply them to a Timesheet via the Timesheet Manager.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if Allowances can be added via Timesheet Manager. When TRUE, Users can create Allowances and apply them to a Timesheet via the Timesheet Manager.
CustomField.label: Include Timesheet Manager Allowances
